wikipedia_page.main: Joseph "Joe" Bonnar (birth registered second ¼ 1948 – 11 February 2017) was an English professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1960s and 1970s. He played at representative level for Cumberland, and at club level for Hensingham ARLFC (in Hensingham, Whitehaven), Whitehaven, Wakefield Trinity (Heritage № 743), and Halifax, as a scrum-half, i.e. number 7.

response: * Joseph Bonnar (1948–2017), English rugby league footballer
